document_data.title: The Copycat
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Copycat''''' is a one-round adventure set in the [[Living City]] organized play program. It was released in April of 1998 and is intended for adventurers of all levels.
document_data.Summary: Takes place after the war and after ''[[A Walk on the Wildside]]'' and ''[[Elementally Speaking: Air's Looking at You]]'' adventures.
